Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 9
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IX; sheet 3; Hieratic ritual text recto and verso. Recto 5-7, Verso B10-B15 (half on Sheet 4). Recto: The Ritual of Amenophis I Verso: Conclusion of the Ritual. A Book of Invocations. A Book of Protection.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, pp.78-113, Vol. 2 Plate 52, Recto 5-6; Plates 53 & 53a, Recto 7; Plate 61, Verso B15 (half on Sheet 4); Plate 60, Verso B10-B15.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57068) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57068)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, fragmentary, loss Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
